response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its importance to you, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an outstanding value considering its worth to you stands at $1,000,000. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
